content: 0xSero: Led a significant code cleanup and tooling modernization effort this month, merging 4 PRs including a major cleanup (#3116) that removed over 26k lines and a substantial migration from ESLint/Prettier to Biome (#2439, #2990) that touched thousands of files. Contributed actively on 8 days with 25 commits, focusing primarily on refactoring and configuration improvements while also fixing a critical environment misconfiguration issue (#2378). Additionally provided 5 code reviews with a mix of approvals and change requests, while maintaining 4 open PRs including several for a new EVM character named Esther.
